fullText: The musical finds its footing when it leans into its own silliness, delivering big laughs and bigger dance numbers that make up for any shortcomings in storytelling sophistication.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic acknowledges significant storytelling weaknesses but finds the entertainment value and production elements strong enough to compensate, suggesting a qualified positive recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights strong comedic and dance elements while acknowledging weaknesses in storytelling, leading to a mixed-positive recommendation.
